amendment.description: Amendment protects forest preserve projects from delay by precluding Court-issued injunctions based on alleged violations of procedural requirements in selecting, planning, or analyzing the project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Daines amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 196 (Roll no. 479).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Daines amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 196 (Roll no. 479).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Daines.
